text: you may not know it but Amazon sells a
$50 tablet the Amazon fire seven is one
of the newest and cheapest and Amazon's
line of fire tablets honestly it's a
really good tablet for what it is you
can do the most basic needs on it from
browsing the web so watching videos to
trying out apps and games but it doesn't
do a whole lot more than that the tablet
has a 7 inch display but it's not HD it
comes in 8 or 16 gigabytes of internal
storage but larger size will cost $70 as
opposed to 50 if you need to add more it
has a microSD slot for up to 256
gigabytes of storage the tablet has a
1.3 gigahertz quad-core processor and it
works just fine for streaming or for
playing games if you open a ton of
browser tab so it might lag a little bit
it also comes in four colors black
yellow blue and red one of the great
things about this tablet is that it is
Alexa enabled it also has all of
Amazon's apps on it so you can reap your
Kindle books you surf the web and you
can download some other games you can't
download any Google apps so you can't
get Gmail on there you can't have Google
Maps or anything like that
but you can also use hulu or netflix it
does have pretty good battery life the
battery will probably last about 8 to 10
hours on a single charge I really liked
using this tablet for reading it's
actually perfect because it fits right
in the palm of your hand
the tablet is super lightweight and
durable but if you need one you can get
a case and a doubles of stand if you're
a Prime member you're going to love
using this tablet you can load your
Prime membership right on here so you
can shop you can read books you can
watch movies you can listen to music
there are a lot of ads and promotions on
this tablet but you can pay to remove
them and if you're a Prime member it
probably won't really bother you anyway
because it'll show things that you've
shopped for in the past or books that
you've read previously in the Kindle
Store another downside is that the
camera is pretty terrible it's very low
resolution and you're not going to be
impressed by it
but most people probably aren't using
their tablet to take photos anyway so
this tablet is a lot more basic than
something like an iPad but if you really
only need it to surf the web or to play
games or use it while you're sitting on
your couch at night it'll get the job
done its closest competitor is actually
another Amazon tablet the fire eight
which is a little bit bigger a little
bit nicer
and it has more storage that one will
cost you $80 stuff after using this
tablet for about a week I would
definitely buy it for $50 you really
can't be surprised and you're getting a
lot for your money
[Music]
